title: Why does he make me feel special? - Quora

response.answer_text: They love to make you feel loved, special in every way. They shower you with gifts & support you Business decisions. This all seems really great, I finally found my “Soulmate”. Just wait as it won’t be long until they will use everything they learned about you against you. Over the years he took all the positive things in my life and turned them negative. They love to watch you get upset. Making you feel special is setting you up to attach you later.
